data.title: There is an Everest for Everyone By Maxime Chaya
data.meta_description: The Office of Communications at AUB cordially invites you to a motivational presentation by Maxime Chaya.
data.text:
The Office of Communications at AUB cordially invites you to a motivational presentation by Maxime Chaya. The presentation is an audio-visual one and takes about an hour in which case Chaya will show his 14-minute Everest documentary followed by a Q&A session.

Special Formula:Maxime Chaya is the first Lebanese person to climb Mount Everest and several other peaks in the world scaling the seven highest peaks in all continents and exploring both poles.

Chaya graduated with honors from the London School of Economics. He has been honored by the Lebanese republic. He published a book entitled “Steep Dreams, My Journey to the Top…”

Through meticulous preparation, rigorous training, and exemplary discipline, he has accomplished a tremendous feat few adventurers in the world have ever dreamed of.
